name: Intercambio
description:
Intercambio contains 55 puzzle rooms where you'll need to use the exchange ray to open the door.

The exchange ray will react differently depending on what object it touches.

Features:

  • 55 levels + 9 demo levels
  • Gameboy style graphics
  • On-screen controller
  • Level editor to design your own puzzles
  • Includes Android (2.3 and up) and Windows versions.
  • USB/Bluetooth Controller support

Keyboard controls:

  • Arrows: movement
  • Space: Shot exchange ray
  • Esc: Restart level
  • Control: Go back to the menu
  • Home: Go to next level

Gamepad controls (Xbox 360 controller):

  • D-pad: movement
  • A: Shot exchange ray
  • Y: Restart level
  • Back: Go back to the menu
